name: Slime-O-Tron-9000
description:
Slime-O-Tron-9000 is a movement puzzle game. Red dies on blue slime, Blue dies on yellow slime and Yellow dies on red slime. Movement is applied on all slimes simultaneously.

Song Used: https://opengameart.org/content/mushroom-dance

mushroom-dance by bart licensed GPL 3.0
